translations: v．罚款；诈取；勒索：从某人处通过罚款、欺诈或勒索等手段非法获取财物。
· He was mulcted of a large sum of money.

sentences.sentence: In short, after centuries of oppression and exploitation, the slave masters were supposed to be further rewarded by a handsome sum mulcted by force from the mass of innocent taxpayers!
sentences.translation: 总之，经过了数世纪的压迫和剥削，奴隶主们似乎值得进一步的奖励，似乎可以强行从普通无辜纳税人那里没收钱来奖励奴隶主！
